contextId.information: "those who have faith." The meaning of the noun "faith" can be expressed with the verb "believe". AT: "those who believe" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_abstractnouns]])
The noun "curse" can be expressed with the verb "curse." AT:  "by being cursed for us" or "when God cursed him instead of us" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_abstractnouns]])
contextId.quote: by becoming a curse for us
